messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm lost???
messages.msgSnippet: Here tis, It s like using the story of the Donner party to justify having weekly barbecues to roast your neighbors. Lynda, who is not responsible for others
messages.messageBody:
Here tis, "It's like using the story of the Donner party to
justify having weekly barbecues to roast your neighbors."

Lynda, who is not responsible for others spewing over this <g>
----------
> From: Pris <x_t_sipr@...>
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm lost???
> Date: Tuesday, September 05, 2000 8:13 AM
>
> okkkkkk??? did I miss something??? what is the *Donner party
comment*???
>
> Pris-clueless ~> who'z always a day late and a $$$ short ...
>
> WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my
cats
> have learned how to type ...
>
>
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
> To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, September 05, 2000 1:04 AM
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Spanking
>
>
>
> > OMG, Kris, please put "spew" warnings on your posts. I just about
sprayed
> > the monitor over the Donner party comment!
> >
> > Lynda, who apologizes to everyone for being silly over a very serious
> > subject but the BBQ'd neighbors was too funny!
